name: Mammut Light Short Removable 28L Airbag 3.0 - Unisex
description: A lightweight, technical pack with all-mountain touring capability, fitted with a Mammut Removable Airbag System 3.0 (RAS) for added safety in avalanche terrain. At 28L, with attachment points for extra gear, and a sub-2kg weight with the RAS system, it's a lightweight rig for hut-to-hut touring and carefully packed overnights. A wire frame suspension system and thermoformed back panel are comfortable for "one more run" and long touring days.Thermoformed padded back panel, padded shoulder straps and hipbelt provide cushion and a balanced feel that skis well.6mm wire V-shaped internal aluminum frame supports the load.Padded hipbelt has an integrated gear loop and zippered pocket.Top-loading zippered access to main and front avi tool compartments.Small zippered internal pocket with key clip.2 ice-axe carriers.Includes pack and RAS system.Refillable air cartridge available separately. Empty cartridges can be filled at approved centres such as dive shops or paintball stores.Safety leg loops for use with the RAS airbag system.
